description: Erection of a single storey rear extention
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition  9 (Cycle Parking) of planning permission 21/00150//FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

The proposal is for 2 new dwellings, therefore the fee required for your planning application is £ 924.00.  We received £462.00, please pay the outstanding balance of £462.00.Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
